It does not store any personal data._gcl_au1 monthUsed as a conversion linker tag in web and AMP containers that can be configured to link across domains for cases where you have the landing pages and conversion pages on multiple domains for Google Adsense_uetvid1 monthUsed by Microsoft Bing Ads and is a tracking cookie. It allows us to engage with a user that has previously visited our website.MR1 monthAnalytics cookie that's used to pass user action information to the Bing advertising network.NID1 monthMicrosoft is an American multinational corporation that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells a range of software products and services.
